channel.title: Server auto-updater
channel.description:
Hello, I am here today to announce the new Mod Dcrews Server Auto-Updater!
From now on, No more re-compiling and waiting ages then restarting!! Just restart.. Absolutely LAG-FREE!
Just run this .BAT aslong as your server is on at the same time, This never needs to be closed! Just keep it open at the bottom or something then when you wish to apply an update say like in CLIENT.JAVA just restart your server then it's updated!
Picture:
[IMG]http://i725.photobucket.com/albums/ww255/dcrew09/serverupdaterpic1.jpg[/img]
Download: (Attachment) Download (Outside Links): [url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=GUDQXE6F]http://www.megaupload.com/?d=GUDQXE6F[/url]

item.title: Server auto-updater
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

itai:

I like that it updates class files, thnx for it =D

What? Obviously it’s going to update the class file if it compiles…

Anyway, there are a million of these. You’re basically releasing a compiler with a useless restarter…

Read full topic

item.title: Server auto-updater
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Dcrew Mod Dcrew
item.description:
@Mod_Dcrew wrote:

Well yes partly, It AUTO-UPDATER to your server standards and updates your .CLASS files.

Read full topic

item.title: Server auto-updater
item.dc:creator: @ollie123 Ollie123
item.description:
@ollie123 wrote:

So basically it’s another ‘compiler’?

Section Rules:

6) No *.bat / list files PERIOD! There are stupid and a waste of time to bother with. Learn to program with a real language. If you’re beatiful server includes one of these in the topic itself (if its included in the download its okay) then it’ll be locked and you’ll be punished. Forgot to mention, they only work on Windows, too. Also lists aren’t really a download as it is usually a text file with some scribbles in it. The official Moparscape client already has a list. USE IT!

Read full topic
